allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix critical tuple unpacking bug in similarity cache logic

When similarity_hash computation fails (returns None), the ternary 
expression was returning None instead of (None, None), causing a 
TypeError during tuple unpacking. This fix ensures the else branch 
returns a proper tuple to match the expected return type.

Impact: Prevents runtime crashes when processing captures with failed
perceptual hash computation.
